Classes

Paria Theatre offers a range of classes and workshops to cater to everyone who is interested in Improv, from the beginner to the advanced. Our classes are a great way to meet new people, develop performance skills and build confidence. We keep prices as cheap as possible to make sure that everyone has the opportunity to take part in them. Below are a list of Classes and opportunities, including casting calls.

1. Everyone's a Genius
2. The Toolbox
3. The Harold
4. Advanced Improv
  • Level One
    Everyone's a Genius
    These classes are the perfect way to dip your toe into the world of improv; improve professional and creative skills or take the first step in making performance your career. We have a focus on building support with those playing with you and treating every idea like the gold it is.
    Learn:
      This is a thing you'll learn
      This is another thing you'll learn
    Requirements:
     None!
    Sign Up:
    Please click here to register your interest in our level one course.
  • Level Two
    The Toolbox
    The second level is perfect for those who already have improv experience. Here we build your comedy utility belt with tricks on how to make funny characters, play with the details in front of you and how to dig yourself out of whatever holes you find yourself in.
    Learn:
      This is a thing you'll learn
      This is another thing you'll learn
    Requirements:
     Successful completion of level one course
    Sign Up:
    Please click here to register your interest in our level two course.
  • Level Three
    The Harold
    This level is designed to explore the worldâ€™s most famous longform format, the Harold. It builds on the previous two levels and looks at how to combine them into a full performance piece. Through this class you will learn to discover theme and tone to your improv and play with this in more than the single scene.
    Learn:
      This is a thing you'll learn
      This is another thing you'll learn
    Requirements:
     Successful completion of level two course
    Sign Up:
    Please click here to register your interest in our level three course.
  • Level Four
    Advanced Improv
    Advanced Improv is all about show formats and forms. The class takes you through the Armando, Monoscene, and Movie formats, looking at their individual challenges, quirks and delights. This level also looks at organic longform improv, unformed performance that has no preconception at all, even down to the form.
    Learn:
      This is a thing you'll learn
      This is another thing you'll learn
    Requirements:
     Successful completion of level three course
    Sign Up:
    Please click here to register your interest in our level three course.
